title: RP Designs Will Sell You The Ultimate MTB Smart-Cockpit Handlebar For $790 USD
content:
RP Designs, manufacturer of Smart-Cockpits, has released “The Ultimate” MTB handlebar; yours for only $790 USD. Clearly, this is no ordinary handlebar. Like RP Designs’…
